cyclone.name: JOSE
cyclone.current_location: about 635 miles ESE of the northern Leeward Islands
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest for the next couple of days, then forecast to bend northwest and eventually north over the open western Atlantic well east of the Bahamas and Bermuda.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Northern Leeward Islands (closest approach, not a U.S. landfall in the next 5 days)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla, Sint Maarten, St. Martin; Tropical Storm Watch: Montserrat, St Kitts, Nevis, Saba, St. Eustatius
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning: Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands from Dominica northward to Anguilla within 48 h
